BriefDescription: PowerPC instruction completed.
The speculative event selected for PMC3 rewinds and the counter for PMC3 is not charged.
The event selected for PMC4 caused the event counter to overflow.
PowerPC instruction completed while the thread was in ultravisor state.
Processor cycles.
The speculative event selected for PMC4 rewinds and the counter for PMC4 is not charged.
The conditions for the speculative event selected for PMC2 are met and PMC2 is charged.
The event selected for PMC5 caused the event counter to overflow.
Cycles when the speculative counter for PMC3 is frozen.
Marked Start probe nop (AND R0,R0,R0) completed.
Cycles when the run latch is set and the core is in ST mode.
Threshold counter exceeded a count of 256.
Threshold exceeded.
Cycles when at least one thread has the run latch set.
Cycles when the thread is in Hypervisor state. MSR[S HV PR]=010.
Cycles when the run latch is set for all threads.
The event selected for PMC1 caused the event counter to overflow.
Cycles when this thread's run latch is set and the core is in SMT4 mode.
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 32.
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 512.
Processor cycles gated by the run latch.
The event selected for PMC2 caused the event counter to overflow.
The speculative event selected for PMC2 rewinds and the counter for PMC2 is not charged.
The conditions for the speculative event selected for PMC4 are met and PMC4 is charged.
The event selected for PMC6 caused the event counter to overflow.
Cycles when this thread's run latch is set and the core is in SMT2 mode.
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 64.
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 1024.
The event selected for PMC3 caused the event counter to overflow.
Marked Start probe nop dispatched. Instruction AND R0,R0,R0.
The conditions for the speculative event selected for PMC1 are met and PMC1 is charged.
The conditions for the speculative event selected for PMC3 are met and PMC3 is charged.
PowerPC instruction completed while the thread was in hypervisor state.
Cycles when the thread is in Ultravisor state. MSR[S HV PR]=110.
Cycles when the thread is in Privileged state. MSR[S HV PR]=x00.
The speculative event selected for PMC1 rewinds and the counter for PMC1 is not charged.
Instruction finished.
Marked instruction finish timeout (instruction was lost).
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 128.
PowerPC instruction completed while the run latch is set.
